name: This Website
description: Personal portfolio website with AI-powered chat interface

name: nwsltr ai
description: An AI-powered newsletter builder that captures your writing style from previous newsletters and uses it to generate your next newsletter. It employs an agentic workflow that conducts internet research, analyzes previous newsletters, and matches your writing tone. The application features a drag-and-drop editor for reorganizing content and adding pictures or additional text, with each text block enhanced by embedded AI capabilities.
features: Captures writing style from past newsletters

name: VR Creator Club
description: A comprehensive VR course with a community of over 1,600 members. It includes a 70+ hour curriculum with 220+ lessons, teaching Unity game engine fundamentals through to advanced multiplayer development techniques. The active community is supported by weekly Q&A calls.
features: Covers Unity basics to advanced multiplayer

name: VR County Fair
description: A VR project built with Unity to demonstrate various VR game development techniques. It includes interactive games like ring toss, shooting balloons, and a strongman hammer game, complemented by user interface elements and a prize exchange system.
